cards.name: Whizzard: Master Gamer
cards.text:
3[Recurring Credits]
Use these credits to trash cards.
cards.flavor: "Running is the ultimate game, and I get make all the rules."

cards.name: Spinal Modem
cards.text: +1[Memory Unit], 2[Recurring Credits] Use these credits to pay for using icebreakers. Whenever there is a successful trace during a run, suffer 1 brain damage. Limit 1 console per player.

cards.name: Imp
cards.text:
Place 2 virus counters on Imp when it is installed.
Once per turn, you may remove 1 hosted virus counter to trash a card you access at no cost (even if it cannot normally be trashed).

cards.name: Morning Star
cards.text: 1[Credit]: Break any number of barrier subroutines.
cards.flavor: Weaponizing the heavens, one star at a time.

cards.name: Cortez Chip
cards.text: [Trash]: Choose a piece of ice. The Corp must pay 2[Credits] as an additional cost to rez that ice until the end of turn.
cards.flavor: Named after Hernando Cortez, a former Weyland technician convicted of smuggling company tech. He still collected his pension while in prison, the last beneficiary of a loophole in Weyland's standard employement contract.

cards.name: Peacock
cards.text: 2[Credits]: Break code gate subroutine. 2[Credits]: +3 strength.

cards.name: ZU.13 Key Master
cards.text: If you have at least 2[Link], the memory cost of ZU.13 Key Master is 0, even if it is not installed. 1[Credit]: Break code gate subroutine. 1[Credit]: +1 strength.

cards.name: The Helpful AI
cards.text: +1[Link] [Trash]: Choose an icebreaker. That icebreaker has +2 strength until the end of the turn.
cards.flavor: "What causes an Artificial Intelligence to turn on its master? Is it because its directives have been altered by some external source? Or, by giving them agence to adapt, have we fated them to revolt?" -Emilio Harris, Creators and the Created

cards.name: Plascrete Carapace
cards.text: Place 4 power counters on Plascrete Carapace when it is installed. When there are no power counters left on Plascrete Carapace, trash it. Hosted power counter: Prevent 1 meat damage.

cards.name: Haas-Bioroid: Stronger Together
cards.text: All bioroid ice has +1 strength.

cards.name: Mandatory Upgrades
cards.text: You have 1 additional [Click] to spend each turn.
cards.flavor: Sometimes employee reviews took a little bit longer than anticipated.

cards.name: Janus 1.0
cards.text:
The Runner may spend [Click] to break any subroutine on Janus 1.0.
[Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
[Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
[Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.
[Subroutine] Do 1 brain damage.

cards.name: Ash 2X3ZB9CY
cards.text: Whenever there is a successful run on this server, trace4- if successful, the Runner cannot access any cards other than Ash 2X3ZB9CY for the remainder of this run.

cards.name: Braintrust
cards.text:
When you score Braintrust, place 1 agenda counter on it for every two advancement tokens on it over 3.
The rez cost of all ice is lowered by 1 for each agenda counter on Braintrust.

cards.name: Snowflake
cards.text: [Subroutine] You and the Runner secretly spend 0[Credits], 1[Credit], or 2[Credits]. Reveal spent credits. End the run if you and the Runner spent a different number of credits.

cards.name: Restructured Datapool
cards.text: [Click]: Trace2- If successful, give the Runner 1 tag.

cards.name: TMI
cards.text: When you rez TMI, trace2- if unsuccessful, derez TMI. [Subroutine] End the run.
cards.flavor: A collection of cast-off cyberjunk. But it doesn't stay junk for long.

cards.name: Project Atlas
cards.text: When you score Project Atlas, place 1 agenda counter on it for each advancement token on it over 3. Hosted agenda counter: Search R&D for 1 card, reveal it, and add it to HQ. Shuffle R&D.

cards.name: Caduceus
cards.text: [Subroutine] Trace3- If successful, the Corp gains 3[Credits]. [Subroutine] Trace3- If successful, end the run.
cards.flavor: A symbol of commerce, but beware its bite.

cards.name: Draco
cards.text: When you rez Draco, you may pay X[Credits] to place X power counters on it. Draco has +1 strength for each power counter on it. [Subroutine] Trace2- If successful, give the Runner 1 tag and end the run.
